TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EntityPropertyMappingAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class EntityPropertyMappingAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class EntityPropertyMappingAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 屬性，指定在實體類型的屬性與 WCF 資料服務所傳回之摘要中的項目之間的自訂對應。

span.span: Attribute that specifies a custom mapping between properties of an entity type and elements of an entry in a feed returned by WCF Data Services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用以在反映提供者的資料模型中定義自訂摘要的對應。The is used to define custom feed mapping in the data model of a reflection provider. 用來產生類別的中繼資料指出，在資料模型中定義自訂摘要的對應時，這個屬性也會套用至產生的用戶端資料服務類別。This attribute is also applied to generated client data service classes when the metadata used to generate the classes indicates that custom feed mappings are defined in the data model. 這項資訊是為了確保用戶端可以建立並使用支援自訂摘要的訊息。This information is necessary to make sure that the client can create and consume messages that support custom feeds. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 摘要自訂](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/feed-customization-wcf-data-services.md)。For more information, see [Feed Customization](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/feed-customization-wcf-data-services.md). ## Examples 在下列範例中，這兩個屬性的`Order`型別會對應至現有的摘要項目。In the following example, both properties of the `Order` type are mapped to existing feed elements. `Product` 類型的 `Item` 屬性會對應至不同命名空間中的自訂摘要屬性。The `Product` property of the `Item` type is mapped to a custom feed attribute in a separate namespace. [!code-csharp[Astoria Custom Feeds#CustomIQueryableFeeds](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/astoria custom feeds/cs/orderitems.svc.cs#customiqueryablefeeds)] [!code-vb[Astoria Custom Feeds#CustomIQueryableFeeds](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/astoria custom feeds/vb/orderitems.svc.vb#customiqueryablefeeds)] 上一個範例會傳回以下 URI `http://myservice/OrderItems.svc/Orders(0)?$expand=Items` 的結果。The previous example returns the following result for the URI `http://myservice/OrderItems.svc/Orders(0)?$expand=Items`. [!code-xml[Astoria Custom Feeds#IQueryableFeedResultInline](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Misc/astoria custom feeds/xml/iqueryablefeedresultinline.xml#iqueryablefeedresultinline)]

related.span: 如何：使用反映提供者建立資料服務 (WCF 資料服務)

span.span: How to: Create a Data Service Using the Reflection Provider (WCF Data Services)

param.name: sourcePath
param.span: 實體型別的屬性名稱 (字串形式)，這個屬性對應至摘要項目的指定屬性。

span.span: The name of the property, as string, of the entity type that is mapped to the specified property of the feed item.

param.name: targetSyndicationItem
param.span: 值，表示摘要中與屬性對應的項目。

span.span: A value that represents the element in the feed to which to map the property.

param.span: 如果 不是 ，則這個值必須設為 None。

span.span: This value must be set to None if the is not .

param.name: targetTextContentKind
param.span: 值，識別要顯示於摘要中的內容格式。

span.span: A value that identifies the format of the content to display in the feed.

param.name: keepInContent
param.span: 布林值 ，表示對應的屬性應同時出現在其所對應 (Mapped-to) 位置與摘要的內容區段中。

span.span: Boolean value that is when the property being mapped should appear both in its mapped-to location and in the content section of the feed.

new System.Data.Services.Common.EntityPropertyMappingAttribute : string * string * string * string * bool -> System.Data.Services.Common.EntityPropertyMappingAttribute

param.name: sourcePath
param.span: 實體型別的屬性名稱 (字串形式)，這個屬性對應至摘要中的指定屬性。

span.span: The name of the property of the entity type, as string, that is mapped to the specified property in the feed.

param.name: targetPath
param.span: 結果摘要中的目標名稱 (表示為字串)，即屬性將對應到其中的目標。

span.span: The name of the target, as string, in the resulting feed to which the property is mapped.

param.name: targetNamespacePrefix
param.span: 這個參數與 共同指定 項目存在的命名空間。

span.span: This parameter, together with , specifies the namespace in which the element exists.

param.name: targetNamespaceUri
param.span: 指定項目的命名空間 URI (表示為字串)，此項目是以 targetName 屬性所指定。

span.span: Specifies the namespace URI of the element, as string, specified by the targetName property.

param.name: keepInContent
param.span: 布林值 ，表示對應的屬性應同時出現在其所對應 (Mapped-to) 位置與摘要的內容區段中。

span.span: Boolean value that is when the property being mapped should appear both in its mapped-to location and in the content section of the feed.

summary.span: 建立 的執行個體，將屬性對應至自訂摘要項目。

span.span: Creates an instance of the to map a property to a custom feed element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有`targetNamespacePrefix`也`targetNamespaceUri`都有指定，`targetName`會成為預設命名空間中。If neither `targetNamespacePrefix` nor `targetNamespaceUri` are specified, the `targetName` will be put in the default namespace. 如果`targetNamespacePrefix`未指定，前置詞會自動產生。If `targetNamespacePrefix` is not specified, a prefix is autogenerated. 如果`targetNamespacePrefix`未指定，但`targetNamespaceUri`未指定，在建構時擲回例外狀況。If `targetNamespacePrefix` is specified, but `targetNamespaceUri` is not specified, an exception is thrown at construction time.

public: property bool KeepInContent { bool get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得布林值，這個值表示是否應該在摘要的內容區段中和所對應 (Mapped-to) 位置中重複保留屬性值。

span.span: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether a property value should be repeated both in the content section of the feed and in the mapped location.

value.span: 值，當屬性同時對應至摘要中的兩個位置時為 ，否則為 。

span.span: A value that is when the property is mapped into both locations in the feed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時的值已`true`，摘要是回溯相容於[!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)]使用通訊協定 1.0 版的用戶端應用程式。When the value of is `true`, the feed is backward compatible with [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] client applications that use protocol version 1.0. 當 windows 7 ' 是`false`，資料服務所使用的通訊協定版本必須是 2.0 版或更新版本的版本。When the value of \`\`is `false`, the protocol version used by the data service must be 2.0 or later versions. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 資料服務版本控制](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/data-service-versioning-wcf-data-services.md)。For more information, see [Data Service Versioning](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/data-service-versioning-wcf-data-services.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SourcePath As String
public: property System::String ^ SourcePath { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得新聞訂閱方式項目的屬性名稱，該項目將對應至摘要的指定項目。

span.span: Gets the name of the property of the syndication item that will be mapped to the specified element of the feed.

value.span: 包含屬性名稱的字串值。

span.span: String value that contains property name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性不能直接參考複雜型別。The property cannot directly reference a complex type. 針對複雜型別，您必須使用路徑運算式，其中的屬性名稱以反斜線 (`/`) 字元隔開。For complex types, you must use a path expression where property names are separated by a backslash (`/`) character. 例如，下列值可用於實體型別`Person`包含整數屬性`Age`和複雜屬性`Address`:For example, the following values are permitted for an entity type `Person` with an integer property `Age` and a complex property `Address`: - `Age` - `Address/Street` 屬性不能設為包含空格或其他字元的值，這些在屬性名稱中不是有效字元。The property cannot be set to a value that contains a space or any other character that is not valid in a property name.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TargetNamespacePrefix As String
public: property System::String ^ TargetNamespacePrefix { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得字串值 (連同 )，指定 項目存在的命名空間。

span.span: Gets a string value that, together with , specifies the namespace in which the element exists.

value.span: 包含目標命名空間前置詞的字串值。

span.span: String value that contains the target namespace prefix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有也都有指定，會成為預設命名空間中。If neither nor are specified, the will be put in the default namespace. 如果未指定，前置詞會自動產生。If is not specified, a prefix is autogenerated. 如果未指定，但未指定，在建構時擲回例外狀況。If is specified, but is not specified, an exception is thrown at construction time.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TargetNamespaceUri As String
public: property System::String ^ TargetNamespaceUri { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得字串值，這個值會指定由 屬性所指定項目的命名空間 URI。

span.span: Gets a string value that specifies the namespace URI of the element specified by the property.

value.span: 包含命名空間 URI 的字串。

span.span: String that contains the namespace URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果對應至非新聞訂閱項目/屬性，這個屬性會是目標項目/屬性的命名空間。If mapping to non-syndication element/attribute, this property is the namespace for the target element/attribute. 如果沒有也都有指定，會成為預設命名空間中。If neither nor are specified, the will be put in the default namespace. 如果未指定，前置詞會自動產生。If is not specified, a prefix is autogenerated. 如果未指定，但未指定，在建構時擲回例外狀況。If is specified, but is not specified, an exception is thrown at construction time.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TargetPath As String
public: property System::String ^ TargetPath { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得摘要中與屬性對應的自訂目標名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the custom target in the feed to which the property is mapped.

value.span: 包含目標 XML 項目或屬性的字串值。

span.span: String value with target XML element or attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設定屬性，則和也必須設定屬性。When the property is set, the and properties must also be set. 值必須是`null`(`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 時的值屬性不是。The value of must be `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) when the value of the property is anything other than . 必須是其中巢狀項目會以反斜線分隔的路徑運算式 (`/`) 和指定屬性以連字號 (`@`)。 must be a path expression in which nested elements are separated by a backslash (`/`) and attributes are specified by an ampersand (`@`). 下列範例中，字串 `UnitsInStock/@ReorderLevel` 將屬性值對應至名為 `ReorderLevel` 的屬性，位於根項目中名為 `UnitsInStock` 的子項目之上。In the following example, the string `UnitsInStock/@ReorderLevel` maps a property value to an attribute named `ReorderLevel` on a child element named `UnitsInStock` of the root entry element. [!code-xml[Astoria Custom Feeds#EdmFeedMappedToAttributeSpecific](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Misc/astoria custom feeds/xml/northwind.csdl#edmfeedmappedtoattributespecific)] 屬性不能包含空白字元。The property cannot contain white space. 屬性不會以 true 的 XPath 運算式，但指定的元素和屬性名稱必須代表語式正確的 XML 元素和屬性。The property is not expressed as a true XPath expression, but the specified element and attribute names must represent well-formed XML elements and attributes. 無效的值會導致資料服務初始化時，會發生例外狀況。An invalid value will cause an exception to occur when the data service is initialized.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TargetSyndicationItem As SyndicationItemProperty

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得 類別上的屬性。

span.span: Gets a property on the class.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果對應至新聞訂閱項目，這個屬性就會為新聞訂閱項目的名稱。If mapping to syndication element, this property is the name of the syndication item. 此值必須設定為`None`如果不是 null。This value must be set to `None` if the is not null.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TargetTextContentKind As SyndicationTextContentKind

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得 所對應屬性之內容的類型。

span.span: Gets the type of content of the property mapped by .

value.span: 字串，識別摘要項目中內容類型。

span.span: A string that identifies the type of content in the feed element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果對應至新聞訂閱內容，則這個屬性會是內容類型的新聞訂閱項目。If mapping to syndication content, this property is the content type of syndication item. 在您指定 屬性的 值時，必須先確保屬性值會包含格式正確的 XML。When you specify a value of for the attribute, you must ensure that the property value contains properly formatted XML. 資料服務會傳回未執行任何轉換的值。The data service returns the value without performing any transformations. 您還必須確保傳回之 XML 中的任何 XML 項目前置詞具備命名空間 URI 以及對應之摘要中所定義的前置詞。You must also ensure that any XML element prefixes in the returned XML have a namespace URI and prefix defined in the mapped feed.
